name: Digimon: Anode Tamer & Cathode Tamer: Veedramon Version
overview: This release contains the first Digimon Adventure, both Anode Tamer and Cathode Tamer versions. The game is based on the manga and anime series Digimon. You play as an ordinary Japanese boy named Ryou who gets sucked into the mysterious digital world and has to help the digital monster Agumon and his friends to recruit digital monsters and send them into battles against evil ones.
